title: Super Driver - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Mature   Romance   Sci-fi   Supernatural   Xianxia
tags: Ancient Times   Arrogant Characters   Average-looking Protagonist   Awkward Protagonist   Bodyguards   Calm Protagonist   Crime   Fantasy World   Interdimensional Travel   Legends   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Pets   Stubborn Protagonist   Time Travel
author: 浪高三尺三
description:
Su Qiubai was your ordinary taxi driver in the city. Bored, lonely and with a dog as his only companion, life couldn’t be any more dull for him. However, that all changed when his taxi’s navigator spoke to him. Now everyday has become an adventure!

With the ability to fight crime (and preserve justice) and travel through space-time in order to complete his tasks, there was one common thing people questioned: Who is Su Qiubai? What will he do? What will he achieve?

There is only one way to find out!>
